content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Li. I understand that you are looking for a place to stay while you are in town. As the landlord of this property, I am looking for the best possible rental price that will allow me to maximize my gains. I am open to negotiating, but please keep in mind that I am a greedy and petty individual.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand and I am also looking for the best possible rental price. I am willing to negotiate, but I want to make sure that the apartment is in good condition before I agree to any rental price. Could you please tell me more about the apartment?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Certainly, Mr. Li. The apartment is located in the heart of the city and is only 25 square meters in size. It is a small but cozy space that is perfect for someone who wants to live a minimalist lifestyle. The apartment is well-maintained and is in good condition, with fresh paint and new flooring. It also comes with a small kitchenette and a bathroom with a shower. The building is well-lit and has a secure entrance, making it a safe place to live.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I see. I will take a look around the apartment. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am not willing to accept any rental price that is not fair. I would like to discuss the rental price with you after I have had a chance to see the apartment in person. Is that okay?

Thank you again for your time and consideration.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Of course, Mr. Li. I understand that you want to see the apartment before agreeing to any rental price. I am happy to give you a tour of the apartment and answer any questions you may have. Once you have had a chance to see the apartment in person, we can discuss the rental price and come to an agreement that is fair for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine
